titleStmt.title: Divine fire-works Or, Some sparkles from the spirit of burning in this dead letter. Hinting what the almighty Emanuel is doing in these wipping times. And in this His day which burns as an oven. In Abhiam. Can any good come out of -? Come and see.

notesStmt.note: Verse -- "The lyon, who a long time shaped,".
In four columns with a vignette of a lion carrying a flaming sword.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
